      Parameters:

      writer -
      Throws:

    • writeElement

      public static void writeElement(Element e, XMLStreamWriter writer, boolean repairing) throws XMLStreamException
      Writes an Element to an XMLStreamWriter. The writer must already have started the document (via writeStartDocument()). Also, this probably won't work with just a fragment of a document. The Element should be the root element of the document.
      Parameters:
      e -
      writer -
      Throws:
      XMLStreamException

    • writeElement

      public static void writeElement(Element e, XMLStreamWriter writer, boolean repairing, boolean endElement) throws XMLStreamException
      Writes an Element to an XMLStreamWriter. The writer must already have started the document (via writeStartDocument()). Also, this probably won't work with just a fragment of a document. The Element should be the root element of the document.
      Parameters:
      e -
      writer -
      endElement - true if the element should be ended
      Throws:
      XMLStreamException

      public static String getUniquePrefix(XMLStreamWriter writer, String namespaceURI, boolean declare) throws XMLStreamException
      Create a unique namespace uri/prefix combination.
      Returns:
      The namespace with the specified URI. If one doesn't exist, one is created.
      Throws:
      XMLStreamException
